alert.note: Alert for Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 5:31PM CDT until August 27 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Schleicher County in west central Texas... Northwestern Sutton County in west central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Us-277 Near The Sutton-Schleicher County Line, or 9 miles north of Sonora, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sonora around 555 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 277 Near The Sutton-Schleicher County Line and The Intersection Of I- 10 And Ranch Road 1989. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 383 and 404. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
